sentences.en: B . If client cannot tolerate sitting, supine anterior chest and - lying positionposterior chest.
sentences.cn: 如病人无法坐起, 可取仰卧位听诊前胸,侧卧位听诊后背.

sentences.en: He always sleeps in a supine position.
He may be turned from side to supine to prone position.
sentences.cn: 他可以从侧卧位转成仰卧位或俯卧位.

sentences.en: I lay supine on the poolside grass.
sentences.cn: 我仰面躺在游泳池边的草地上。

sentences.en: Objective To reduce the incidence of supine hypotensive syndrome caesarean operation.
sentences.cn: 目的降低剖宫产术中仰卧位低血压综合征的发生率.

sentences.en: Objective To reduce the incidence of supine hypotensive syndrome during caesarean operation.
sentences.cn: 目的　降低剖宫产术中仰卧位低血压综合征的发生率.

sentences.en: Pathology DGR usually occurs in fast and supine situation.
sentences.cn: 病理性DGR多发生于空腹卧位.

sentences.en: Patient position: axial coronal and oblique sagittal, supine, prone.
sentences.cn: 扫描方位: 横轴位(Axial)、冠状位(Coronal) 、矢状斜位(Obliquesagittal) 和横轴俯卧位(prone)等.

sentences.en: Sebastian had been supine on the sunny seat in the colonnade, as he was now.
sentences.cn: 在柱廊里, 塞巴斯蒂安就象现在这样仰卧在洒满阳光的位子上.

sentences.en: The decubitus positions are used if there is overlying bowel gas in the supine position.
sentences.cn: 如果仰卧位上有肠道气体,则可以采用卧位.

sentences.en: The subjects were studied in the supine, standing, and sitting positions.
sentences.cn: 受试者分别接受仰卧位, 站立位和坐位的研究.

sentences.en: The victim was supine on the stretcher.
To drain upper lobes , anterior segments, place the child supine on a pillow in your lap.
sentences.cn: 引流肺上叶的肺前段, 把枕头放在你的腿上,让小儿仰卧在枕头上.

words.tran_cn: 仰卧的；懒散的；掌心向上的；向后靠的

trans.tran_cn: 仰卧的，消极的，懒得动的
